data.title: Nara Nath Acharya
data.meta_description: Pandit Kaviraj Nara Nath Acharya (1906–1988) was a Nepalese Pandit, Kaviraj and writer of Sanskrit and Nepali language. He is best known for his biography of the poet Bhanubhakta Acharya, first published in 1960. He was a grand nephew of Bhanubhakta Acharya.
data.text:
Pandit Kaviraj Nara Nath Acharya (1906–1988) was a Nepalese Pandit (Sanskrit Scholar), Kaviraj (Ayurvedic physician) and writer of Sanskrit and Nepali language.[1] He is best known for his biography of the poet Bhanubhakta Acharya, first published in 1960.[2] He was a grand nephew of Bhanubhakta Acharya.[3]
